meanings.sent1: The farmer used oxhides to make leather goods.
meanings.sent2: The tanner purchased a batch of oxhides for his workshop.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran off with an oxhide, thinking it was a giant chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The history book described the oxhides as shields in ancient battles.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the tanned oxhide lingered in the workshop.

meanings.sent1: The market displayed various oxhides for sale.
meanings.sent2: The oxhides were stacked neatly in the corner of the barn.
meanings.sent3: The children used oxhides as makeshift sleds on the snowy hill.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted a beautiful landscape on the oxhides.
meanings.sent5: The sound of drums echoed through the hall, made from stretched oxhides.
